comment: Don't take her. Nice lady (when she isn't being passive aggressive), but doesn't provide clear instructions, answer questions, or have a clear schedule for assignments. I didn't learn much of anything, and anything I did learn was on my own or with my peers.

Do not take Dr. Strieker. I took her this past semester and she is the most unorganized professor I have ever had. She is all about group projects which I sometimes enjoy doing, but NOT with this professor. Most of the projects are powerpoint based and has each group member individually turn identical ones in and will drop points if someone is late
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: I enjoyed all of her classes and was always given help when I asked for it!

Yes she is hard, but she is BRILLIANT. A true inspiration. Very passionate and kind. Does not offer help but if you go to her she is more than willing to help. Helped me find a job on campus while I was still in school. Great women.
Try to avoid her if you can. I still have no clue what this lady wants.
Very unhelpful. Changes grading requirements frequently!
